title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1901 - Short-term Temporary Release Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1901 - Short-term Temporary Release Programs

State Regulations
§ 1901.1 - Criteria for participation in short-term temporary release
§ 1901.2 - Procedures for the operation of short-term temporary release

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1901

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 139, 852

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
